name: Pathorite
description:
This game is made with Gemix studio by Nowy.

Trees by https://itch.io/profile/bigbuckbunny .

Castle wizard by https://lionheart963.itch.io/ .

Some graphics by https://henrysoftware.itch.io/ .

Use cursors to move character, (Z),(X) and (C) as buttons.

You can create your own levels by editing island2.png in data folder.

To win collect ten crystal prism.
